fn.p: Funding. DRIVE funding was obtained for protocol development and for data and documentation management during the seasons 2017/18 and 2018/19 (Grant No. 777363 — DRIVE — H2020-JTI-IMI2-2016-09-two-stage). The Austrian Sentinel Physician Surveillance Network was supported by Sanofi Pasteur, Biomedica and Valneva. The supporters had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
